message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SE 

This paper deals with the security and privacy aspects of updating IoT devices using blockchain technology. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also involves network protocols and distributed systems, which could fall under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) respectively. The use of blockchain technology and smart contracts also suggests the possibility of cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) being a relevant category. Finally, the implementation of the proposed protocol in Solidity suggests that cs.SE (Software Engineering) could also be a relevant category.
